name: LCD - Percutaneous Vertebral Augmentation (PVA) for Osteoporotic Vertebral Compression Fracture (VCF)
description: This policy outlines the coverage criteria for Percutaneous Vertebral Augmentation (PVA), including Percutaneous Vertebroplasty (PVP) or Kyphoplasty (PKP), for the treatment of Osteoporotic Vertebral Compression Fractures (VCF) (T1-L5).

restrictions.condition: Diagnosis of osteoporotic vertebral compression fracture (VCF) must be present
Vertebral compression fracture (VCF) must be anatomically located between T1 and L5
Acute (less than 6 weeks from symptom onset) osteoporotic VCF documented by bone marrow edema on MRI
restrictions.rule: VCF_onset_status = 'Acute' AND VCF_onset_acute_window_weeks < 6 AND VCF_imaging_bone_marrow_edema_MRI = TRUE

restrictions.condition: Acute (less than 6 weeks from symptom onset) osteoporotic VCF documented by bone-scan uptake
restrictions.rule: VCF_onset_status = 'Acute' AND VCF_onset_acute_window_weeks < 6 AND VCF_imaging_bone_scan_uptake = TRUE

restrictions.condition: Acute (less than 6 weeks from symptom onset) osteoporotic VCF documented by SPECT/CT uptake
restrictions.rule: VCF_onset_status = 'Acute' AND VCF_onset_acute_window_weeks < 6 AND VCF_imaging_SPECT_CT_uptake = TRUE

restrictions.condition: Subacute (6 to 12 weeks from symptom onset) osteoporotic VCF documented by bone marrow edema on MRI
restrictions.rule: VCF_onset_status = 'Subacute' AND VCF_onset_subacute_window_weeks >= 6 AND VCF_onset_subacute_window_weeks <= 12 AND VCF_imaging_bone_marrow_edema_MRI = TRUE

restrictions.condition: Subacute (6 to 12 weeks from symptom onset) osteoporotic VCF documented by bone-scan uptake
restrictions.rule: VCF_onset_status = 'Subacute' AND VCF_onset_subacute_window_weeks >= 6 AND VCF_onset_subacute_window_weeks <= 12 AND VCF_imaging_bone_scan_uptake = TRUE

restrictions.condition: Subacute (6 to 12 weeks from symptom onset) osteoporotic VCF documented by SPECT/CT uptake
restrictions.rule: VCF_onset_status = 'Subacute' AND VCF_onset_subacute_window_weeks >= 6 AND VCF_onset_subacute_window_weeks <= 12 AND VCF_imaging_SPECT_CT_uptake = TRUE

restrictions.condition: Patient is hospitalized with severe pain (Numeric Rating Scale (NRS) or Visual Analog Scale (VAS) pain score 8 or higher)
Non-hospitalized patient with moderate to severe worsening pain (NRS or VAS score 5 or higher) despite optimal non-surgical management (NSM)
restrictions.rule: patient_hospitalization_status = FALSE AND (pain_score_NRS_nonhospitalized >= 5 OR pain_score_VAS_nonhospitalized >= 5) AND non_surgical_management_attempted = TRUE AND pain_worsening_status = TRUE

restrictions.condition: Non-hospitalized patient with stable to improved pain (NRS or VAS score 5 or higher) after optimal non-surgical management (NSM), with progression of vertebral body height loss and greater than 25% vertebral body height reduction
restrictions.rule: patient_hospitalization_status = FALSE AND (pain_score_NRS_nonhospitalized >= 5 OR pain_score_VAS_nonhospitalized >= 5) AND non_surgical_management_attempted = TRUE AND vertebral_body_height_loss_progression = TRUE AND vertebral_body_height_reduction_percentage > 25.0

restrictions.condition: Non-hospitalized patient with stable to improved pain (NRS or VAS score 5 or higher) after optimal non-surgical management (NSM), with progression of vertebral body height loss and kyphotic deformity present
restrictions.rule: patient_hospitalization_status = FALSE AND (pain_score_NRS_nonhospitalized >= 5 OR pain_score_VAS_nonhospitalized >= 5) AND non_surgical_management_attempted = TRUE AND vertebral_body_height_loss_progression = TRUE AND kyphotic_deformity_present = TRUE

restrictions.condition: Non-hospitalized patient with stable to improved pain (NRS or VAS score 5 or higher) after optimal non-surgical management (NSM), with progression of vertebral body height loss and severe impact of VCF on daily functioning (RDQ score greater than 17)
restrictions.rule: patient_hospitalization_status = FALSE AND (pain_score_NRS_nonhospitalized >= 5 OR pain_score_VAS_nonhospitalized >= 5) AND non_surgical_management_attempted = TRUE AND vertebral_body_height_loss_progression = TRUE AND daily_functioning_RDQ_score > 17

restrictions.condition: Non-hospitalized patient with stable to improved pain (NRS or VAS score 5 or higher) after optimal non-surgical management (NSM), with greater than 25% vertebral body height reduction and kyphotic deformity present
restrictions.rule: patient_hospitalization_status = FALSE AND (pain_score_NRS_nonhospitalized >= 5 OR pain_score_VAS_nonhospitalized >= 5) AND non_surgical_management_attempted = TRUE AND vertebral_body_height_reduction_percentage > 25.0 AND kyphotic_deformity_present = TRUE

restrictions.condition: Non-hospitalized patient with stable to improved pain (NRS or VAS score 5 or higher) after optimal non-surgical management (NSM), with greater than 25% vertebral body height reduction and severe impact of VCF on daily functioning (RDQ score greater than 17)
restrictions.rule: patient_hospitalization_status = FALSE AND (pain_score_NRS_nonhospitalized >= 5 OR pain_score_VAS_nonhospitalized >= 5) AND non_surgical_management_attempted = TRUE AND vertebral_body_height_reduction_percentage > 25.0 AND daily_functioning_RDQ_score > 17

restrictions.condition: Non-hospitalized patient with stable to improved pain (NRS or VAS score 5 or higher) after optimal non-surgical management (NSM), with kyphotic deformity present and severe impact of VCF on daily functioning (RDQ score greater than 17)
restrictions.rule: patient_hospitalization_status = FALSE AND (pain_score_NRS_nonhospitalized >= 5 OR pain_score_VAS_nonhospitalized >= 5) AND non_surgical_management_attempted = TRUE AND kyphotic_deformity_present = TRUE AND daily_functioning_RDQ_score > 17

restrictions.condition: Referral for evaluation of Bone Mineral Density (BMD) and osteoporosis education for subsequent treatment as indicated is required
Instruction to participate in an osteoporosis prevention/treatment program is required
Current back pain must be primarily due to the identified acute or subacute VCF(s)
No diagnosis of osteomyelitis
No diagnosis of discitis
No diagnosis of active systemic infection
No diagnosis of active surgical site infection
Patient is not pregnant
No more than three vertebral fractures per procedure
No allergy to bone cement
No allergy to opacification agents
No uncorrected coagulopathy
No spinal instability
No myelopathy from the fracture
No neurologic deficit
No neural impingement
No fracture retropulsion
No canal compromise
Procedure performed must be one of the covered CPT codes for Percutaneous Vertebral Augmentation
